content: mc-increase in the next mc repeat from * around 72 mc round 13 mc in the first second and third mc mc-increase in the next mc * mc in the next 8 mc mc-increase in the next mc repeat from * around mc in the last 5 mc 80 mc rounds 14-16 mc in each mc around 80 mc round 17 * mc in the next 7 mc mc-decrease over the next three mc repeat from * around 72 mc © t bailey 2008 all rights reserved round 18 mc in first and second mc mc-decrease over the next three mc * mc in the next 6 mc mc-decrease over the next three mc repeat from * around mc in the last 4 mc 64 mc round 19 * mc in the next 5 mc mc-decrease over the next three mc repeat from * around 56 mc round 20 mc in each mc around 56 mc round 21 * mc in the next 4 mc mc-decrease over the next three mc repeat from * around 48 mc round 22 * mc in the next 3 mc mc-decrease over the next three mc repeat from * around 40 mc round 23 mc-decrease over first three mc * mc in the next 2 mc mc-decrease over the next three mc repeat from * around mc in the last two mc 32 mc rounds 24-25 mc in each mc around 32 mc border using g hook work two or more rounds as follows chain 1 single_crochet in each st around join with sl st to first single_crochet 64 single_crochet finish off and weave in ends © t bailey 2008 all rights reserved
